Fioren:
The danger, which bears [Shilen], gradually it approaches. If this Korolev deaths it will awake, I cannot even occur, beside what chaos this peace will throw down. And the stronger the influence Of [shilen], the stronger its children, dragons. Among this chaos before the crystal labyrinth began to appear powerful Demons. I do not know, what intrigues they will here braid, but there is no occasion to doubt, that they must be stopped.
